definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: mighty, valiant—´[[א]] Job 34:20 + Is 10:13 Kt (Qr [[כַּבִּיר]]); cstr. id. 1Sa 21:8; pl. [[אַכִּירִים]] Job 24:22 +;—mighty (alw. = subst. & poet. exc. 1Sa 21:8).

men Ju Jdg 5:22, Job 24:22 (= violent) Job 34:20, Je 46:15, 1Sa 21:8 (rd. [[הָרָחִים]] ´[[א]] Gr Dr, cf. 1Sa 22:17; but Lag:Probebibel [[אׂבִיל הָעֲיׇרִים]] v. Id.:BN 45; Klo [[גִּבּוֹר]]), La 1:15; [[אַבִּירֵי לֵב]] stout of heart Is 46:12 (= obstinate) Ps 76:6.

animals; bull, sim. of king of Assyr. Is 10:13 (rd. [[כְּאַבִּיר]] & v. Di); elsewh. pl.; metaph. for enemies [[אַבִּירֵי בָשָׁן]]) Ps 22:13 (‖[[פּרים]]); for princes Ps 68:31; for Edomites Is 34:7; hence even as sacrif. Ps 50:13 (‖[[עַתּוּדִים]]); of horses Je 8:16, Je 47:3, Je 50:11.
